GopeedLab/gopeed

Download manager using Golang and Flutter, handles HTTP, BitTorrent, Magnet, works on all platforms

Related repos

  • Self-hosted software for internet speed analysis
  • HTTP server and client library for Go
  • proxy for torrent indexers, connects apps like Sonarr and Radarr
  • Multipart downloader library for .NET with real-time progress events
  • cross‑platform resource sniffer and downloader for video, audio, images, m3u8
